## Release Playbook
- [ ] Rebase against master
- [ ] Release branch ()
- [ ] Pass CI ()
- [ ] Code review
- [ ] Merge into master
- [ ] Release master ()
- [ ] Pass CI ()
- [ ] Update staging rack
- [ ] Edit [Rack release record](https://github.com/convox/rack/releases) and/or update [docs](https://github.com/convox/convox.github.io)
- [ ] Publish release
- [ ] Release CLI
